% ============================================================================
% Meeting Agenda Base Template
% ============================================================================
% This is the shared base template for all Meeting Agendas.
% DO NOT edit this file for individual meetings.
%
% Usage: Create a thin wrapper that defines variables and content, then:
%   \input{../templates/meeting_agenda_base.tex}
%
% Required variables (define before \input):
%   \MeetingTitle       - Meeting title
%   \MeetingSubtitle    - Subtitle (e.g., "Systems Engineering Phase: Project Initiation")
%   \MeetingDate        - e.g., January 13, 2026
%   \MeetingTime        - e.g., 10:00 AM EST
%   \MeetingDuration    - e.g., 90 minutes
%   \MeetingLocation    - e.g., Conference Room A
%   \MeetingDialIn      - Optional dial-in info
%   \MeetingOrganizer   - Organizer name
%   \MeetingFacilitator - Facilitator name
%   \MeetingNoteTaker   - Note taker name
%   \MeetingAttendees   - Content for attendees itemize list
%   \MeetingObjective   - Objective paragraph
%   \MeetingAgendaItems - Content for agenda tabularx (rows only)
%   \MeetingContent     - Additional sections (decisions, requirements, etc.)
%   \MeetingActionItems - Content for action items tabularx (rows only)
%   \MeetingNotes       - Content for notes section
%   \MeetingNext        - Next meeting info
%
% ============================================================================

\documentclass[11pt]{article}

% ============================================================================
% PACKAGES
% ============================================================================
\usepackage[margin=1in]{geometry}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{lastpage}
\usepackage{hyperref}

% ============================================================================
% COLORS AND STYLING
% ============================================================================
\definecolor{headerblue}{RGB}{0, 51, 102}
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    linkcolor=headerblue,
    urlcolor=headerblue
}

% ============================================================================
% HEADER AND FOOTER
% ============================================================================
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[L]{\small\textcolor{gray}{\MeetingTitle}}
\fancyhead[R]{\small\textcolor{gray}{\MeetingDate}}
\fancyfoot[C]{\small Page \thepage\ of \pageref{LastPage}}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}

% ============================================================================
% DOCUMENT
% ============================================================================
\begin{document}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% TITLE BLOCK
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{center}
    {\Large\textbf{\MeetingTitle}}\\[0.5em]
    {\normalsize\textcolor{gray}{\MeetingSubtitle}}
\end{center}

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% MEETING DETAILS
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{tabularx}{\textwidth}{@{}lX@{}}
    \textbf{Date:} & \MeetingDate \\
    \textbf{Time:} & \MeetingTime{} (\MeetingDuration) \\
    \textbf{Location:} & \MeetingLocation \\
    \textbf{Dial-in:} & \MeetingDialIn \\
    \textbf{Organizer:} & \MeetingOrganizer \\
    \textbf{Facilitator:} & \MeetingFacilitator \\
    \textbf{Note Taker:} & \MeetingNoteTaker \\
\end{tabularx}

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% ATTENDEES
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Attendees:}

\begin{itemize}
    \MeetingAttendees
\end{itemize}

\vspace{0.5em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% MEETING OBJECTIVE
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Objective:}

\MeetingObjective

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% AGENDA
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Agenda:}

\vspace{0.5em}

\begin{tabularx}{\textwidth}{@{}p{1.2cm}Xr@{}}
    \toprule
    \textbf{Time} & \textbf{Topic} & \textbf{Lead} \\
    \midrule
    \MeetingAgendaItems
    \bottomrule
\end{tabularx}

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% ADDITIONAL CONTENT (decisions, requirements, pre-read, etc.)
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\MeetingContent

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% ACTION ITEMS
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Action Items:}

\vspace{0.5em}

\begin{tabularx}{\textwidth}{@{}Xlr@{}}
    \toprule
    \textbf{Action} & \textbf{Owner} & \textbf{Due Date} \\
    \midrule
    \MeetingActionItems
    \bottomrule
\end{tabularx}

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% NOTES
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Notes:}

\MeetingNotes

\vspace{1em}

% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
% NEXT MEETING
% ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
\noindent\textbf{Next Meeting:}

\MeetingNext

\end{document}
